messages.message:
Hi Team,

Loved experimenting with the new AI Hub Commercial beta.   Very excited to see the early concepts of validations and human review!

One thing that appears to be missing is the ability to filter the documents and fields by only those that have failed a validation.

This is a powerful feature in the field, especially when convincing a customer to pivot away from the idea of only wanting to see STP.   Showing how operators only have to be concerned with the specific documents that failed (versus all), and then calling their attention to only the fields that did not pass validation is key.
Thank you for the feedback, @JD. This is the first version of lightweight human review and we will definitely work on improving the experience in the following releases. cc @andy @Jianqi Xing

Thanks Bastiane,

Do I need to create anything for the EPD board or do you have it documented?  I think the filters should be prioritized.
Yes, itâ€™d be great if you can create an EPD ticket for this. I will send out more details on testing commercial and providing feedback next week as we move to uat
